Part 1: Exploratory Data Analysis

Loading libraries
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(randomForest)
library(gbm)
library(ISLR)
library(tree)
library(tidyverse)
```

Loading dataset
```{r}
salaries <- read.csv("ds_salaries.csv")
head(salaries)
str(salaries)
```
Check the unique values of the character values experience level, employment level, job title, salary currency, employee residence, company location and company size
```{r}
unique(salaries$employee_residence)
```
